TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyMap extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一種方式，以轉譯 Windows Forms 控制項和 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 項目之間的屬性值。

span.span: Provides a way to translate property values between Windows Forms controls and Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別定義之間的翻譯[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]屬性和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]混合式應用程式中的屬性。Use the class to define translations between [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] properties and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] properties in a hybrid application. 並上的屬性和類別會定義兩個技術之間的對應。The and properties on the and classes define mappings from one technology to the other. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 使用 ElementHost 控制項對應屬性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms788740\(v=vs.100\).aspx)並[逐步解說： 使用 WindowsFormsHost 元素的對應屬性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms788729\(v=vs.100\).aspx)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Mapping Properties Using the ElementHost Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms788740\(v=vs.100\).aspx) and [Walkthrough: Mapping Properties Using the WindowsFormsHost Element](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms788729\(v=vs.100\).aspx). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何加入的對應屬性設控制項。The following code example shows how to add a mapping for the property to an control. [!code-csharp[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/CSharp/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/VisualBasic/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.vb#12)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何取代的預設對應屬性上的控制項。The following code example shows how to replace the default mapping for the property on a control. [!code-csharp[PropertyMappingWithWfh#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithWfhSample/CSharp/PropertyMappingWithWfh/Window1.xaml.cs#12)] [!code-vb[PropertyMappingWithWfh#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithWfhSample/VisualBasic/PropertyMappingWithWfh/Window1.xaml.vb#12)]

permission.span: 針對完全信任立即呼叫端。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 這個成員無法被繼承，部分信任程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

summary.span: 使用指定的來源物件，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given source object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `source` 做為來源的屬性，這會轉譯由。`source` is the source of the properties which are translated by the . 對應中的屬性必須存在於。The properties which are mapped in the must exist on . 使用目前的屬性值上呼叫委派。 delegates are called using the current property values on .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reset(string propertyName) cil managed

span.span: The name of the property to restore.

summary.span: 還原指定屬性的預設屬性對應。

span.span: Restores the default property mapping for the given property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法具有下列效果。The method has the following effects on the . - 還原已移除預設屬性對應。A default property mapping that has been removed is restored. - 會移除已新增的屬性對應。A property mapping that has been added is removed. - 已覆寫預設屬性對應會還原為其預設值。A default property mapping that has been overridden is restored to its default value.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResetAll() cil managed

span.span: Restores the default property mappings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法具有下列效果。The method has the following effects on the . - 還原已移除的預設屬性對應。Default property mappings that have been removed are restored. - 已新增的屬性對應會移除。Property mappings that have been added are removed. - 已覆寫的預設屬性對應會還原為其預設值。Default property mappings that have been overridden are restored to their default values.
